How to make a panoramic cockpit like

Spherical screen for RasterProp could work or I need to write a plugin myself?

I believe the H.O.M.E. development thread has a wide angle camera based display in its new command pod using RasterProp. But based on personal experience with Render-to-texture, you're going to have issues with very high resolution texture based displays.

A good alternate to using RasterProp would be to use the built in camera system that the default pods use. Have your cockpit instrumentation float in front of your kerbal, with no interior walls modeled. If you want a 'activate main display' function, you would have to model the interior walls, and have a texture in place to make them 100% transparent.

Here is an example of the second method I developed a while back. hud1 hud2

Either way, you got your work cut out for you, if you want it to look good. Best of luck!
